name: sir quaver: bane of the ghost notes
name_original: sir quaver: bane of the ghost notes
description:
PLAYING WITH SOUND ON IS RECOMMENDED

You're sir Quaver, a brave knight with a sharp blade. You were tasked with clearing your kingdom's castle, which is under the crescente attack of the ghost notes. Defeat their leader before the magic song ends (and he reaches the throne)! 

How to play

WASD or arrow keys to move;
Space to attack;
R to go back to the menu;

Avoid the obstacles (chandeliers) and pick up the swords to get your health (floating sword) filled up, then attack. After you attack, you can't take damage until you pick up a sword piece.
